comments.author: hackbert
comments.body: Hi Minerjones,Lot 5, can be slabed by any grading company you work?Thanks!

comments.author: minerjones
comments.body: Quote from: hackbert on October 03, 2023, 08:56:49 PMLot 5, can be slabed by any grading company you work?This is item is too big for ICG.... maybe in the future PCGS or NGC will grade this, but currently they will not.Quote from: rsincognito on October 03, 2023, 08:10:28 PMLOT 1: .005Quote from: tldr-hodl on October 04, 2023, 06:01:56 AMLot #3 - 0.005 BTCCurrent high bids

comments.author: 2stout
comments.body: Quote from: minerjones on October 04, 2023, 03:36:43 PMQuote from: hackbert on October 03, 2023, 08:56:49 PMLot 5, can be slabed by any grading company you work?This is item is too big for ICG.... maybe in the future PCGS or NGC will grade this, but currently they will not.Won't this fit in a PCGS oversized holder- seems they have holders that can fit kilo sized coins?  Also, it appears PCGS is now grading 1HoDLCLUB items- https://www.pcgs.com/pop  >>Decentralized Currency>>Cryptocurrency>>1HoDLCLUB

comments.author: minerjones
comments.body: Quote from: 2stout on October 04, 2023, 04:06:28 PMQuote from: minerjones on October 04, 2023, 03:36:43 PMQuote from: hackbert on October 03, 2023, 08:56:49 PMLot 5, can be slabed by any grading company you work?This is item is too big for ICG.... maybe in the future PCGS or NGC will grade this, but currently they will not.Won't this fit in a PCGS oversized holder- seems they have holders that can fit kilo sized coins?  Also, it appears PCGS is now grading 1HoDLCLUB items- https://www.pcgs.com/pop  >>Decentralized Currency>>Cryptocurrency>>1HoDLCLUBYes, but sometimes they don't grade particular items.. have had quite a few different makers items they list be returned to meMight just need time for them to get to know the items better.
